data.text: To all the beautiful mothers out there, the greatest fighters in the world... Happy Mother's Day! We love you! http://t.co/VZ1GsnmfUb

RT @1L196Countries: @AsianaAirlines I'm colorful bcuz 
I leave the earth 
fly among the rainbows in 
a jet that transports me 2 worlds 
who…
@bonirachan Bon voyage! :)
@MsNathalieL You'll need to contact our Customer Relations at customerus@flyasiana.com with your e-ticket number. Thank you!
2 days away from Mother's Day! Show us your best photos with #MOM for a chance to win an #ASIANA prize! :) #welovemom http://t.co/tT67aatg6l
Good morning! RT if traveling brings you happiness! #travel #flyASIANA http://t.co/ix1P3Ktjng
@sociopsychopath Wow, sounds like a long journey around the globe! Glad your flight with us was enjoyable! :)
We're excited to fly to Jakarta too! RT @manamalizer: So excited for 19th of July.. Hola Dreams Wings! Welcome to Indonesia @AsianaAirlines
Our OZ First Suite was featured on Premier Traveler's April/May issue! Read the article here: http://t.co/Y7TA0pG6Tc http://t.co/V8XAr4Pi6x
Mother's Day is only 3 days away! Tweet us your photos with #MOM and tell us why she's special! http://t.co/FB0XVe6j9a
RT @dweekly: Why hello, Taipei. Nice to meet you. In other news Asiana Airlines is pretty schwing. [pic]: http://t.co/HRj8kv6WgH
@dweekly Thanks for flying with us! We're glad you enjoyed the in-flight meal. ;)
@MiuMiu1120 @STARZ4LIFE It was our pleasure of handing the tickets to huge B.A.P. fans! :) Congrats and we're happy you enjoyed the show!
@Euro_LR That's a nice engine! :)
Were you at the B.A.P. LA concert on Tuesday? Here's a photo of the boys and the audience! http://t.co/XfCV2XpM0K Definitely looks like fun!
5/8/13 -- Happy Fibonacci Day! #nerdsrule #flyASIANA http://t.co/OFNcnp3r6u
Flying out to Korea? Make sure to stop by the Suncheon Bay Garden Expo to take a whiff of the fresh flowers! #Travel http://t.co/L4pn2ZO1NL
This is an amazing shot of our A330! Thanks! RT @MaaziSatakli: Nightshot of @AsianaAirlines at @Delhi_Airport --> http://t.co/JhYYvVjnKi
@adakitman You'll need a 13-digit Asiana e-ticket number (starts with 988-) in order to use this feature here: http://t.co/MknmO3I3gC
Good morning! It's an exciting day -- we've reached 20,000 followers! Thank you to all of our wonderful Tweeps! http://t.co/bwkkHbdOZt
@STARZ4LIFE Hope you have a GREAT time tonight! :) Make sure to tweet us pictures!
@adakitman Unfortunately, we don't have the online check-in feature on our website as of yet. You may select a seat assignment if available.
Are you Gangnam Style? As the 3rd largest district in Seoul, there's much to see, eat, and shop! #TravelTuesday http://t.co/EE6Y6y48H2
Be sure to keep tweeting us photos of #MOM by Mother's Day! What makes mom special to you?
Good morning! Where will you take off to today on this #TravelTuesday? http://t.co/MVMTAaLnbV
RT @william82sg: Had #Bibimbap at #AsianaAirlines earlier! Love the #Gochujang sauce mixed w rice, beef & veggies!… http://t.co/WpCjZGbWgR
We're celebrating Mother's Day all week! Tweet us your photos with #MOM for a chance to win a special prize! :)
Flying with a @StarAlliance carrier? Miles earned onto your Asiana Club depends on the booking class of your ticket: http://t.co/I6agzK8DEh
Asiana Club members, staying at a SWISSOTEL this summer? You might not want to miss out on these bonus miles! http://t.co/HGcEJ4Xf6h
Thanks for the photo! “@LHRlocal: An  @AsianaAirlines #jumbo landing at #London #HeathrowAirport #aviation #avgeeks http://t.co/0ctHQ9FClE”
Happy Cinco de Mayo! In Korea, today is Children's Day. Celebrate the kids who bring joy into your lives! :) http://t.co/Uq5WyDhlCP
The underbelly! "@ivandalavia: @AsianaAirlines http://t.co/KbAP0F4LxE"
May the Fourth be with you. #flyasiana #nerdsrule http://t.co/ayWhBFJeH7
If you participated in our B.A.P LA concert ticket contest with @soompi on Facebook, we'll be announcing our winners soon! Enter now!
@ColtsFan1203 Glad you received the package well! Hope you enjoy it! :)
Hungry for top-notch in-flight meal? Here's a photo of our First Class meal by @Forest412. http://t.co/bIEHUDW9sh. What do you think?
@sungcui A BIG CONGRATULATIONS is at hand! :) Thanks for your loyalty! We really appreciate it.
2 of our special superstars stand side by side and couldn't make us any happier! Fighting! @psy_oppa @HyunJinRyu99 http://t.co/ULnenwRVPm
Here's a few of our in-flight movie selection for your entertainment this month! Which are you looking forward to? http://t.co/8csRcLuFPg
RT @Forest412: Very excited to fly @AsianaAirlines for the 1st time in their first class to JFK!too bad it wont be the new suites..would be…
The MAY issue of ASIANA in-flight magazine is out! Did you get a chance to flip through this yet? http://t.co/EqunljxABU
RT @ColtsFan1203: My newest prized possession !  Thanks @asianaairlines! http://t.co/wIjlV2BGvp
May Day! In Korea, today is labor day. To those in the US (and other parts of the country) who are faced with just another weekday, cheers!
RT @adventureiq: @AsianaAirlines I dream of flying all the time!
Congrats to @HyunJinRyu99 on another win tonight! #hyunjinryu #ryu
Do you dream of flying? #sweetdreams #flyasiana http://t.co/T6Vf6n7ekK
Don't forget, our SEA-ICN and ORD-ICN routes are increasing to daily flights! Time to pack your bags! http://t.co/U1jO6PwX0y
The weather is getting warmer which only means 1 thing: summer is approaching! This summer we introduce the FIRST SUITE on our JFK-ICN flts!
@DVD_bang You may contact our UK office at the following number: 44-(0)845-602-9900. Thank you!
@OneNoor15 Thank you for the support! Hope to have you on our wings soon! :)
RT @soompi: SoCal Babies! Soompi & @AsianaAirlines  is giving away 9 pairs of tickets to the B.A.P concert in LA next week! ^__^ http:/…
Hard to resist a nice bowl of bibimbap! RT @ehammond87: Had dinner plans. Browsed @AsianaAirlines pics online. New dinner plans. #bibimbap
@melissaiscool Glad you appreciate the silverware! :) Thanks for coming on-board with us on our wings.
@SvenLuckermans Hope you have an amazing experience on these @StarAlliance flights! :)
According to Business Insider, we're tied 4th place as the 20 Best Airlines in the World! http://t.co/3rcrMB9fiH Thanks! :) #traveltuesday
@onewil Are you an Asiana Club member and was your flight with Asiana Airlines? If so, you may contact 800.227.4262. :)
RT @_dOKumENtARy: From the @AsianaAirlines flight yesterday...: http://t.co/TR334fCkuE
Thanks for sharing! RT @hendrabarnes: @AsianaAirlines Beautiful machine arriving on a just as gorgeous day in Sydney. http://t.co/YBzyakUsfO
@alongcamebetty Hope your flight was a good one! Glad you got to experience the flat-bed service! :)
@benneedsholiday Thanks for the #FF mention! :)
@TimmyTabasco Thank you! You just may be the best fan around! :)
@MrLegoBuilder Thanks for the perfect rating! We're glad to have had you on-board.
@Salamakha Thanks so much for the concern. We understand it may be outdated, and we're constantly working with our team to improve it. :)
@MJDY We're glad we were able to be of service! Hope to have you on board our wings again soon!
@HotdogDiva Sorry to hear you had a bad experience with our agents. Is there anything we might be able to assist you with?
It's #FollowFriday! Tweet us a picture or let us know where you're from! #FF
Good morning! TGIF! It's Friday but our flights don't stop on the weekends. Have a beautiful day! http://t.co/MsojPaoBLC
RT @kokomoseven: Just won an autographed @psy_oppa CD from @AsianaAirlines !! Thanks again!
[ATTN] Flight OZ271 SEA-ICN on 26APR (today). New ETD: 3:30PM. There has been a 1hr 10 min. delay. Connecting flts will be handled at SEA.
@intrepidteacher You may contact our reservations specialists at (800)227-4262 if you'd like further info.
@intrepidteacher Where are you flying out from? If your routing/ticket permits, we might be able to offer overnight hotel or a city tour.
@dkelly1110 Thank you so much for the compliment! We're glad to have had you on board! :)
@mandimiranda Looks like great news, don't you think?
@intrepidteacher We think Asiana is a good choice to go. We offer great service, safety, and comfort! Give us a try! :)
@nyipnyip_ We love to see our wings! :) Hope you enjoyed your flight. Where was your destination?
Thank you for flying with us! :) RT @Nevetsah: Thank you @AsianaAirlines for a great flight! http://t.co/inQCdXKUz3
And our last winner for the autographed @psy_oppa CD is: @kokomoseven! Congrats! Please check your DM for further info! :)
Glad you enjoyed it! Hope to see you again soon! RT @dkelly1110: @AsianaAirlines flew the first suite from ORD last month. Just fantastic.
Who's in a New York State of Mind? Grab your coats JFK, our First Suite/Quadra Smartium Biz Class is coming your way! http://t.co/MJdaa89O9c
@captaindanuk We're flattered! Thanks for the kind compliments! :)
We still have 1 more autographed @psy_oppa CD! Retweet for your chance to win! Are you #GangnamStyle or a #Gentleman? http://t.co/BQ0oHl5dEQ
Our first winner for the autographed "Gangnam Style" CD by @psy_oppa is @ColtsFan1203! Congrats! Please check your DM for further info.
@shirotama45 We continuously run various events on our Twitter page! Make sure to follow us and be on the lookout! :)
RT @damiankoh: Magic show onboard @AsianaAirlines enroute from Sydney to Seoul. Party! http://t.co/ox3Gx1tvZ6
For those who participated in our event for UCLA's KCN 2013, the winners have been posted here: https://t.co/FMuDrqEPNY Check it out! :)
We're giving away a round-trip ticket to Asia on our Facebook page! Chime in and let us know what makes you colorful! http://t.co/X5X4VrL7fA
2013 marks the 90th anniversary of the founding of the Turkish Republic. Experience culture and the renaissance in Istanbul! #TravelTuesday
Fly to New Delhi for a ride on the fast tracks with the Delhi Metro & exhibits such as Latitude 28 to feed your artistic mind #TravelTuesday
If you enjoy the hustle and bustle of university life, try visiting Hongdae in Seoul, Korea. Food? Check! Shopping? Check! #TravelTuesday
@dktr_dr We're sorry for the inconvenience. If you DM us your ticket #, we will look into it and attempt to provide an explanation.
"Gentleman" (@psy_oppa) hit 200million views in 9 days! To celebrate, we're giving away 2 autographed CDs! RT to win! http://t.co/AnAEzMiLbx
Traveling to Korea? Make sure to visit Garden Expo 2013 in Suncheon Bay area to experience mother nature first-hand! http://t.co/QFrnHvoaO9
@IvankaSonal2 Following! Thanks for the love!
@heathrown Hope you have a pleasant flight with us! Make sure to tweet us pictures of your experience! :)
"Gentleman" (@psy_oppa) hit 200million views in 9 days! To celebrate, we're giving away 2 autographed CDs! RT to win! http://t.co/kTpwuPjQLM
The Cherry Blossoms are thriving in Seoul! Have you had a glimpse of these beauties yet? #happyearthday #flowers http://t.co/exU0efPHhn
Beautiful photo! What a great shot! RT @Pilot_Dude: #aviation Pic of the Day http://t.co/qme1HigGzq #Boeing @AsianaAirlines
@tobypapa Unfortunately, we do not yet have Wi-Fi service on our flights.
We clean our engines to maintain the optimal engine output by eliminating particles and dust flow. #happyearthday http://t.co/BH4jOpTI46
Happy Earth Day! Take care of the earth and in return, we'll live in a healthy and thriving environment. http://t.co/JXKS49ACo1
